Hi Leonardo Kurtz,

I sincerely apologize for the delayed response.Due to the New Year holiday and the subsequent surge in orders, a significant backlog of unprocessed emails has resulted in delayed responses. We extend our deepest apologies once again.
​​I checked that your order was delivered on December 26th. Could you confirm if you haven't received it? If you confirm, I will help you verify it as soon as possible.
